alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:57AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pennington County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1156 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rapid City Airport, or 10 miles east of Rapid City, moving east- southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Caputa around 1205 PM MDT. New Underwood and Farmingdale around 1215 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 64 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
